name: PAT_ENC_MSP_ADL_LB
description: This table contains information about additional liability insurers for the Accident part of the Medicare Secondary Payor Information from the Patient (EPT) master file.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: MSP_ADDL_LIAB_INS
columns.description: Free text entry for any additional liability insurers. The first liability insurer is stored in the discrete fields in table PAT_ENC_MSP_ACCDNT.
